mapper.select: SELECT c.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM qr_manage_menu m WHERE m.category_id = c.id) as menu_count FROM qr_manage_category c WHERE c.shop_id = #{shopId} ORDER BY c.sort_order ASC

SELECT c.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM qr_manage_menu m WHERE m.category_id = c.id AND m.is_visible = true) as menu_count FROM qr_manage_category c WHERE c.shop_id = #{shopId} AND c.is_visible = true ORDER BY c.sort_order ASC
SELECT c.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM qr_manage_menu m WHERE m.category_id = c.id) as menu_count FROM qr_manage_category c WHERE c.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qr_manage_category (shop_id, name, description, sort_order, is_visible, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{shopId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{sortOrder}, #{isVisible}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE qr_manage_category SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
